name: divPlaceholder
title: jQuery.divPlaceholder.js
description: A mostly-CSS-with-a-bit-of-jQuery micro-plugin to emulate the placeholder attribute for contenteditable divs. The placeholder text cosmetically resembles an inputâ€™s placeholder. All markup used is valid. The placeholder text does not appear in the DOM. The placeholder text disappears when the `div` contains any text or when it has input focus.
